name: Heavy Duty: Legs
description: Mentzer's brutal leg workout. Pre-exhaust quads with leg extensions, then destroy them with leg press or squats. Minimal sets, maximum intensity. Your legs will thank you (eventually).

exercises.notes: Light movement to get blood flowing. Hip circles, leg swings.
1 LIGHT warmup set on leg extension. Just to feel the muscle.
LEG EXTENSION: Squeeze at top for 2 sec. 4-2-4 tempo. All the way to FAILURE.
LEG PRESS or SQUAT: Immediately (no rest). Quads are pre-fatigued. Deep range of motion. To FAILURE.
1 working set to failure. Squeeze at contraction. 4-2-4 tempo.
Full stretch at bottom, hard squeeze at top. 1 set to failure. Hold top for 2 sec each rep.

tips: The quad pre-exhaust superset is BRUTAL - your quads will be screaming before compound
On leg press/squat: go deep, control the negative, explode (but controlled) on positive
You may need to reduce weight significantly on the compound since quads are pre-fatigued
WAIT AT LEAST 5-7 DAYS before training legs again - they need recovery time
If you can walk normally after this workout, you didn't go hard enough
